title: Mitochondrial dysfunction significantly contributes to the sensitivity of tumor cells to anoikis and their metastatic potential
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): G.I. Solyanik, D.L. Kolesnik, I.V. Prokhorova, O.V. Yurchenko, O.N. Pyaskovskaya
